title: People Are Sick Of Government Telling Them They Can't Buy Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Happy 4/20! To celebrate, we're joined by Kaelan Castetter and Allan Gandelman, who played an integral part in New York legalizing cannabis. The key to true social equity and why limited licenses stifle innovation and create an unequitable marketplace. Very bullish on non-psychoactive cannabinoids. Hemp for industrial use probably has the highest ceiling. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
